actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House regarding the transfer of fissionable material to any nonsignatories of the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty.

summary.text: Urges the President to suspend any transfer of enriched uranium to any nation which has not signed the Non-Proliferation Treaty, until public hearings on the transfer can be held by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission and until such time as the serious dangers inherent in such a transfer can be more accurately assessed.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House regarding the transfer of fissionable material to any nonsignatories of the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty.
